snippet.title: Puzzle Pelago - Official Game Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam (Windows, macOS): https://tinyurl.com/y4h48g3l
App Store (iPhone, iPad): https://tinyurl.com/y47m5vnd

A storm has devastated the islands of Puzzle Pelago. Can you help the islanders rebuild their economy?

Puzzle Pelago is a Drag & Drop puzzle game from Hallgrim Games is out now on iPhone and iPad, and is coming soon to Android, Windows PC and macOS. 

Interested? Sign up for the release newsletter at https://www.puzzlepelago.com 

For (more or less) regular development updates, follow me on Twitter and Instagram, @hallgrimgames, or at facebook.com/hallgrimgames

Thanks for watching and stay curious!
